atsone: Sci Hibiscus est un acteur reconnu de la promotion et de la gestion immobilière, avec plus de 24 ans d’expérience et une présence solide à Yaoundé, Douala et dans d’autres villes. Nos projets durables et structurants nous permettent de croître de manière maîtrisée et continue. Sci Hibiscus offre des opportunités de carrière dans l’ensemble des métiers de l’immobilier : développement de projets, transactions, gestion immobilière, suivi et maîtrise d’œuvre, ainsi que fonctions techniques et administratives.
atstwo: Au-delà des missions exigeantes et des défis professionnels, ce qui distingue Sci Hibiscus est l’esprit d’équipe, la rigueur et la volonté collective de livrer des projets de qualité, utiles et pérennes. Chez Sci Hibiscus, l’intégrité, l’engagement et l’état d’esprit comptent autant que les compétences et la performance.
gd1: Develop visual identities, logos, and brand guidelines that ensure consistency across print and digital touchpoints.
gd2: Design marketing materials: brochures, banners, social media assets, email templates and signage.
gd3: Create UI/UX assets and high-fidelity mockups for web and mobile in collaboration with developers.
gd4: Produce and prepare print-ready files; liaise with printers and suppliers to ensure quality and deadlines.
gd5: Translate strategic briefs into creative concepts and present design proposals to stakeholders.
gd6: Maintain and update the company’s asset library (icons, imagery, templates).
gd7: Ensure all deliverables respect accessibility, responsive constraints and brand standards.
gd8: Participate in creative reviews, incorporate feedback and iterate quickly while respecting timelines.
gf1: Degree or diploma in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, Multimedia or equivalent professional experience.
gf2: Strong portfolio demonstrating brand work, digital interfaces and print production.
gf3: Excellent command of Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign) and familiarity with Figma or Sketch.
gf4: Good understanding of typography, color theory, layout and visual hierarchy.
gf5: Experience preparing print files and working with external suppliers.
gf6: Organized, deadline-driven and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
gf7: Good communication skills in English; French is a plus.
gf8: Team player with a proactive, solution-oriented mindset.
go1: Permanent contract with a competitive salary and benefits package.
go2: Creative, collaborative work environment with flat hierarchies.
go3: Opportunities for professional development and training.
go4: Flexible working arrangements and partial remote work by agreement.
go5: Modern tools and a supportive team to bring ideas to life.
go6: Regular team events and a culture that values design excellence.
